flowers.title: Anthurium
flowers.description: Anthurium, is a genus of about 1000 species of flowering plants, the largest genus of the arum family, Araceae. General common names include anthurium, tailflower, flamingo flower, and laceleaf.

flowers.title: Aster
flowers.description: Aster is a genus of flowering plants in the family Asteraceae.

flowers.title: Bupleurum
flowers.description: Bupleurum is a large genus of annual or perennial herbs or woody shrubs, with about one hundred and ninety species, belonging to the Apiaceae family.
